Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_set_stream_volume

The function AIL_set_stream_volume controls a stream's playback volume level.

void AIL_set_stream_volume(
  HSTREAM stream,
  S32 volume
);

In Parameters

stream
indicates the stream whose volume is to be set.
volume
is a MIDI-compatible volume level from 0 (minimum) to 127 (maximum).

Discussion

All stream volume scaling occurs at full sample precision. 8-bit samples are scaled via a lookup table for maximum performance, while 16-bit samples are scaled via an integer multiply-shift sequence for highest fidelity.

When a stream is initialized by AIL_open_stream, the sample's volume value is set to the DIG_DEFAULT_VOLUME preference. The default value for DIG_DEFAULT_VOLUME is 100 on a scale of 0 to 127. The slightly reduced default volume value helps to bridge the inherent volume imbalance between FM music and digital audio on many sound cards.


Group: Digital Audio Streaming Services
